PARAGRAPH.STRING: is an active volcano and the highest point of the Comoros at 2361 m above sea level.
is the southernmost and largest of the two shield volcanoes forming Grande Comore island, the largest island in the nation of Comoros.
is notoriously active, having erupted more than 20 times since the 19th century. Frequent eruptions have shaped
3 by 4 km summit caldera, but the island has largely escaped broad destruction. Eruptions on April 17, 2005, and May 29, 2006 have ended a period of quiet.
